title: Determine Baseball Players' Standard Deviations
text: For each baseball player, determine how many standard deviations (#ofSTDEVs) his batting average is away from the average, for his team. Pay careful attention to signs when comparing and interpreting the answer.

title: Fredo's Standard Deviation
text: How many standard deviations away from the mean is Fredo? Pay careful attention to sign. Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Fredo's Standard Deviation
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{0.158-0.166}{0.012}$$? Round to the nearest hundredth.

title: Karl's Standard Deviation
text: How many standard deviations away from the mean is Karl? Pay careful attention to sign. Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Karl's Standard Deviation
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{0.177-0.189}{0.015}$$? Round to the nearest hundredth.

title: Determining Which Student's GPA is Better
text: Which baseball player had a higher batting average when compared to their school? Effectively, which baseball player had a higher standard deviation score?
